snippet: Minnesota Vikings wide receiver Jerome Simpson was released from jail on $12,000 bail about seven hours after he was arrested on suspicion of driving while intoxicated.
abstract: Minnesota Vikings wide receiver Jerome Simpson is released from jail on $12,000 bail about seven hours after he is arrested on suspicion of driving while intoxicated; other NFL news noted.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota Vikings wide receiver Jerome Simpson was released from jail on $12,000 bail about seven hours after he was arrested on suspicion of driving while intoxicated.
